title: Train Fault Causing Delays on the North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Free bus service between #AngMoKio and #ToaPayoh has ceased.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train service has resumed. Free bus service is still available between #AngMoKio and #ToaPayoh.
[NSL] Estimate 20 mins additional traveling time from #Yishun to #ToaPayoh towards #MarinaBay due to train fault near #Bishan.
